remarks: Value of addition in a univariate power series ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
psr1plusg.y $e |- Y = ( PwSer1 ` R ) $.
